name: io.github.bpamiri/u2-mcp
title: U2 MCP Server
description: Connect AI assistants to Rocket Universe/UniData MultiValue databases via MCP.

environmentVariables.name: U2_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Universe/UniData server hostname or IP address

environmentVariables.name: U2_SERVICE
environmentVariables.description: Service type: 'uvcs' for Universe, 'udcs' for UniData

environmentVariables.name: U2_READ_ONLY
environmentVariables.description: Disable write operations for safe exploration

environmentVariables.name: U2_MAX_RECORDS
environmentVariables.description: Maximum records returned from SELECT queries

environmentVariables.name: U2_BLOCKED_COMMANDS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of blocked TCL commands
